subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer earned a record 32nd Grand Slam semifinal berth and will face Novak Djokovic on Friday. Fifth-seeded Jo-Wilfried Tsonga and Andy Murray also advanced.
snippet: Roger Federer earned a record 32nd Grand Slam semifinal berth and will face Novak Djokovic on Friday. Fifth-seeded Jo-Wilfried Tsonga and Andy Murray also advanced.
